definition: complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters

sentences.english: It was evident that her physical strength could not support her strenuous task.
sentences.chinese: 繁重的工作显然使她有些力不胜任。

sentences.english: Moving books from the bookshelf is a hard work in the library.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆藏书倒架是一项专业性较强的繁重工作。

sentences.english: At that time we were busy restoring the Dunhuang Murals, and could find no time for that task.
sentences.chinese: 但因为当时敦煌百废待举工作繁重，无法承担。

sentences.english: So that Shakespeare's own sovereignty will, Been a heavy Oppression.
sentences.chinese: 使莎士比亚的自我主权心志，遭到了綦重繁重榨取。

sentences.english: The most difficult and onerous tasks to build a well-off society comprehensively focus on rural area.
sentences.chinese: 全面建设小康社会，最艰巨最繁重的任务在农村。

sentences.english: The Academy of Military Sciences shoulders heavy scientific research missions and has a heavy workload.
sentences.chinese: 军事科学院军事理论科研任务繁重，工作强度大。

sentences.english: Specifying the properties for each file in a project is a burdensome task.
sentences.chinese: 指定项目中每个文件的属性是一项繁重的任务。

sentences.english: The twelfth house is associated with rest and reflection, not with strenuous activity.
sentences.chinese: 第十二宫关乎休息和反思，而非繁重的活动。

sentences.english: Her palms were excoriated by the hard labour of shoveling.
sentences.chinese: 她的手掌因繁重的挖土劳动而磨破了皮。

sentences.english: Alas, that will not involve laboriously digging up lots of roads.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，这将不会涉及繁重的大量道路挖掘工作。

sentences.english: The foreign aid to the country was believed to be nothing but a white elephant.
sentences.chinese: 那个国度得到的外助岂但无益而且成了繁重的累赘。
繁重的劳动使他的双手生出茧子来。

sentences.english: Digging that clay soil is back- breaking work.
sentences.chinese: 挖那粘土是一件艰苦繁重的工作。

sentences.english: In the end, Godiva's husband keeps his word and abolishes the onerous taxes.
sentences.chinese: 之后戈黛娃的丈夫遵守诺言，赦免了繁重的税赋。

sentences.english: This new machine will emancipate us from the hard work.
sentences.chinese: 这部新机器将把我们从繁重劳动中解放出来。

sentences.english: Thus, the problem of heavy system maintenance can be solved.
sentences.chinese: 从而有效地解决了机房繁重的系统维护工作。

definition: many and complicated/mired in minor details
to tax one's mind and body/demanding (work)/dedicated (worker)/hard-working
